actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on April 21, 2025.

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Clerk notified the House that he had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on April 15, 2025, at 1:05 p.m.: That the Senate agreed to S. Res. 178.

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Clerk notified the House that he had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on April 14, 2025, at 2:55 p.m.: That the Senate agreed to H. Con. Res. 22.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Pastor Zack Randles, Waterfront Church DC, Washington, D.C.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Adrian Smith to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
